title: Health Data Integration Framework – Standardized API for Health Device Data Ingestion
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want a standardized API for health device data ingestion so that I can seamlessly integrate health monitoring devices into my applications while ensuring secure data handling and compliance with healthcare regulations.

title: Caregiver Input Integration for Personalized Care Plans
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate caregiver input into personalized care plans so that I can build applications that enhance real-time health monitoring and ensure timely interventions for elderly users.

title: Automated Escalation to Emergency Contacts
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to implement automated escalation to emergency contacts so that caregivers and family members can be notified promptly in urgent care situations.

title: Health Monitoring Alerts System - Immediate Notifications for Caregivers
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to design a health monitoring alerts system that provides immediate notifications for caregivers based on real-time data from wearables so that I can ensure timely intervention for elderly users and improve their quality of life.

title: Real-Time Health Data Integration
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to implement secure APIs that facilitate real-time health data streaming from wearables to the ALFRED system so that I can create timely notifications for caregivers about urgent care events.

title: Medication Management Interface – Caregiver Notifications for Missed Doses
summary: As a developer, I want to implement a system that automatically notifies caregivers of missed medication doses so that they can ensure timely interventions and better health outcomes for elderly users.

title: Secure Access Controls for Sensitive Information
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to ensure that my applications have secure access controls for sensitive user health information so that I can comply with healthcare regulations and protect user privacy.

title: Shared Access to User Health Data
summary: As a developer, I want to create applications that enable caregivers to access real-time health data of elderly users so that they can provide timely support and interventions.
